Sorry, already committed the null check.
ok. but it is better to do this in JiraUtils.getCharacterEncodingValidated() method
No, it's not right to pass a null repository to that method (it should arguably throw an IllegalArgumentException instead of a NullPointerException) but that doesn't really make a difference.
ok, but I don't see any point to replace npe with illegal argument exception.
